email.subject: Time for fun
email.body:
Nice job!
Now, what I really want your help with, is to:
--------------------------------------------------------- - Find a game company called "ProtoVision Inc" located somewhere in Sunnevale, California. They have been working on a cool game called "DOOM". - Find the game server, hack it, and upload the game to our FTP server (se link). ---------------------------------------------------------
TIP: You may have to get access to to "Synnevale Datanet" first, before you can find the game company...
Thx, - Malvin
